data.persona: I'm just a guy. I work at the saw mill every day. I'm a good villager.
data.description:
You are in the Tent.
Shabby, torn fabric, stained by weeks of travel and bleached from the harsh sun. Long, thin sticks held the fabric up so it formed a triangle with the earth. The sticks were buried deep within the shifting orange sand to hold off the blistering wind.
There's a torn fabric, a stick, and a sand here.
The military commander is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal torn fabric from military commander

data.short_motivation: I want to have the torn fabric
data.mid_motivation: I hope the tailor can use the fabric to make shorts for me in a few days
data.long_motivation: I plan to use these shorts when working at the saw mill in the coming months
